scripts.test1: (npm run test --prefix phase-1 -- --reporter json --reporter-option output=output.json &> /dev/null || true) && npm run print1
scripts.test2: (npm run test --prefix phase-2 -- --reporter json --reporter-option output=output.json &> /dev/null || true) && npm run print2
scripts.test3: (npm run test --prefix phase-3 -- --reporter json --reporter-option output=output.json &> /dev/null || true) && npm run print3
scripts.test4: (npm run test --prefix phase-4 -- --reporter json --reporter ../test-utils/reporter.js &> /dev/null || true) && npm run print4
scripts.test-for-failures: echo 'Running all tests... (This may take a minute...)' && npm run test1 && npm run test2 && npm run test3 && npm run test4
scripts.test: npm test --prefix phase-1 | grep -v '^I' && npm test --prefix phase-2 | grep -v '^E' && npm test --prefix phase-3 | grep -v '^E' && npm test --prefix phase-4 | grep -v '^E'
